movie.title: Paradise Found 2015
movie.description_intro: A NASA scientist discovers a new theory of mind that can change the world, and has spent his life in exile proving the theory. He confronts his dying father, a tyrannical CIA agent and World War II veteran experiencing PTSD with flashbacks to combat, sexcapades in Paris and surreal visions. The story comes to an explosive conclusion, as the old man arrives at a shocking realization.
movie.description_full: A NASA scientist discovers a new theory of mind that can change the world, and has spent his life in exile proving the theory. He confronts his dying father, a tyrannical CIA agent and World War II veteran experiencing PTSD with flashbacks to combat, sexcapades in Paris and surreal visions. The story comes to an explosive conclusion, as the old man arrives at a shocking realization.

movies.title: Scars of Xavier
movies.summary: A serial killer targets women, at night, for murder.
movies.description_full: A serial killer targets women, at night, for murder.
movies.synopsis: A serial killer targets women, at night, for murder.

movies.title: The Last Witch Hunter
movies.summary: The modern world holds many secrets, but the most astounding secret of all is that witches still live amongst us; vicious supernatural creatures intent on unleashing the Black Death upon the world. Armies of witch hunters battled the unnatural enemy across the globe for centuries, including Kaulder, a valiant warrior who managed to slay the all-powerful Queen Witch, decimating her followers in the process. In the moments right before her death, the Queen curses Kaulder with her own immortality, forever separating him from his beloved wife and daughter in the afterlife. Today Kaulder is the only one of his kind remaining, and has spent centuries hunting down rogue witches, all the while yearning for his long-lost loved ones. However, unbeknownst to Kaulder, the Queen Witch is resurrected and seeks revenge on her killer causing an epic battle that will determine the survival of the human race.

movies.title: Resident Evil: Vendetta
movies.summary: Chris Redfield enlists the help of Leon S. Kennedy and Rebecca Chambers to stop a death merchant, with a vengeance, from spreading a deadly virus in New York.
movies.description_full: Chris Redfield enlists the help of Leon S. Kennedy and Rebecca Chambers to stop a death merchant, with a vengeance, from spreading a deadly virus in New York.

movies.title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
movies.title_english: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
movies.title_long: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas (1998)
movies.summary: The big-screen version of Hunter S. Thompson's seminal psychedelic classic about his road trip across Western America as he and his large Samoan lawyer searched desperately for the "American dream"... they were helped in large part by the huge amount of drugs and alcohol kept in their convertible, The Red Shark.
